Package Model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Master class that manages all actions to be done on application run. Contains instances of the other classes and allows for user movement, manipulation, and observation on these objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int GAME_IS_END
      Integer returned in turn() that indicates if the application run should end after the current action.
      static int LAND_ON_CHANCE
      Integer returned in turn() that indicates if the active player landed on an instance of ChanceSpace upon movement.
      static int LAND_ON_COMMUNITY
      Integer returned in turn() that indicates if the active player landed on index 24 of the gameBoard attribute upon movement.
      static int LAND_ON_FREE
      Integer returned in turn() that indicates if the active player landed on index 8 of the gameBoard attribute upon movement.
      static int LAND_ON_JAIL
      Integer returned in turn() that indicates if the active player landed on index 16 of the gameBoard attribute upon movement.
      static int LAND_ON_OWNABLE
      Integer returned in turn() that indicates if the active player landed on an instance of OwnableSpace upon movement.

      Integer returned in turn() that indicates if the active player landed on index 0 of the gameBoard attribute upon movement.
      static int LAND_ON_TAX
      Integer returned in turn() that indicates if the active player landed on an instance of TaxSpace upon movement.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game​(int nPlayers)
        Constructor for a Game object that constructs an instance of Bank as well. The instantiation of gameBoard and gameDeck is done through the methods setGameBoard() and setGameDeck().

        The activePlayer attribute will be given a value upon the ordering of Players.

        Parameters:
        nPlayers - Integer that holds the number of players that will be in the Game.
        See Also:
        orderPlayers(ArrayList), setGameBoard(Board), setGameDeck(Deck)

    • Method Detail

      • orderPlayers

        public void orderPlayers​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> diceResults)
        Method that orders the contents of the playerList attribute according to the diceResults parameter. The corresponding values in diceResults is set as a virtual key for each corresponding Player in playerList. These instances are then ordered in descending order according to the keys and their nPlayerNum attribute set to the appropriate value as well.

        After ordering, activePlayer is set equal to the instance at index 0 of the modified playerList attribute.

        Parameters:
        diceResults - ArrayList of Integer objects that holds the results of random number generation done externally.

      • swapPlayers

        public void swapPlayers​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> tempList,
                        int pos1,
                        int pos2)
        Method used to swap the positions of two Player instances in a list of such objects.
        Parameters:
        tempList - ArrayList of Player objects that contains the two instances that are to be swapped.
        pos1 - Integer holding the position of the first instance to be swapped with the second.
        pos2 - Integer holding the position of the second instance to be swapped with the first.

      • rollDice

        public int rollDice()
        Method that returns a random integer between 1 and 6, inclusive, to simulate the rolling of a single die. Calling this function is usually done in twos.
        Returns:
        Integer that is randomly generated between the range 1-6, inclusive.

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        Changes the activePlayer attribute to the next instance as ordered in the playerList attribute.

      • turn

        public int turn​(int diceHolder)
        Method handling the movement and landing of the activePlayer attribute on the gameBoard attribute.
        Parameters:
        diceHolder - Integer holding the number of "steps" that the activePlayer will take to go to the new location.
        Returns:
        Predefined final integer that is determined by where the activePlayers has landed or if the GAME_BANK's dValue attribute is reduced to at most 0.
        See Also:
        Player.movePlayer(Board, int, boolean, Bank)

      • doesGameResume

        public int doesGameResume()
        Method checking if the current Game will be terminated based on the following conditions:
        • A Player has already collected two full sets of OwnableSpace instances or
        • The dValue attribute of the GAME_BANK is reduced to at most 0.

        The Game may also end if a Player is also rendered bankrupt, however checking of that condition is done during instances of payment.

        Returns:
        Integer holding the reason for Game termination: returns 1 if the first condition was satisfied; 2 if the second condition was satisfied, and 0 if the Game shall resume.
        See Also:
        Player.isTypeComplete(int)

      • rankPlayers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Player> rankPlayers()
        Method that returns the final ranking of Players at Game termination.

        Players are ranked based on their total cash on hand (dCash) and the total value of their ownedSpaces including the prices of Property development.

        If the Game ends on Player bankruptcy, that Player will always be on the bottom of the rankings no matter the worth of their ownedSpaces;

        Returns:
        ArrayList of Player objects that are ranked based on their dWorth

      • consolePrintPlayers

        public void consolePrintPlayers()
        Console printing method that displays the playerList on the environment console. Used only in program testing and confirmation.

      • getNumPlayers

        public int getNumPlayers()
        Getter method for the NUM_PLAYERS attribute of this class.
        Returns:
        Integer holding the number of Players that participated in this Game instance.

      • getPlayerList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayerList()
        Getter method for the playerList attribute of this class.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Player objects that holds those that participated in this Game instance.

      • getActivePlayer

        public Player getActivePlayer()
        Getter method for the activePlayer attribute of this class.
        Returns:
        Player object that holds the current, active player of the Game.

        Board object.

        Returns:

      • setGameBoard

        public void setGameBoard​(Board gameBoard)
        Setter method for the gameBoard attribute of this class.
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - Board object that will be the new gameBoard of the Game

      • setGameDeck

        public void setGameDeck​(Deck gameDeck)
        Setter method for the gameDeck attribute of this class.
        Parameters:
        gameDeck - Deck object that will be the new gameDeck of the Game

      • playerOrderString

        public java.lang.String playerOrderString()
        Equivalent toString method that returns only the objects in the playerList attribute in order.
        Returns:
        A concatenated String representation of the Players in the playerList.
